item.title: 特朗普吹捧的千亿美元人工智能 "星际之门 "项目将利用太阳能发电
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统宣称将加速美国人工智能发展的千亿美元风险投资，预计将部分依赖于其关注气候问题的前任所青睐的动力来源— 太阳能和电池。【原文：A $100 billion venture that President Donald Trump heralds as accelerating artificial intelligence in the US is expected to depend in part on power sources favored by his climate-focused predecessor — solar and batteries.】

item.title: 特朗普签署加密货币行政法案后，比特币走高
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统签署了与加密货币和人工智能有关的行政措施后，比特币小幅走高。【原文：Bitcoin edged marginally higher after President Donald Trump signed executive actions related to cryptocurrency and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 阿根廷削减出口税以挽救受干旱影响的收成
item.description: 阿根廷削减了为其提供数十亿美元出口收入的主要农作物的税收，试图向与干旱和全球低价搏斗的农民施以援手。【原文：Argentina slashed taxes on its major crops that provide billions of dollars in export revenue as it seeks to throw a lifeline to farmers wrestling with a drought a low global prices.】

item.title: 阿根廷干旱迫使交易所下调大豆和玉米产量预测
item.description: 阿根廷的干旱正在侵蚀该国最重要的农作物。【原文：A drought in Argentina is eating into the country’s most important crops.】

item.description:

item.title: Vsquare 报道：库什纳的亲信将加入匈牙利的 "迷你迪拜
item.description: Vsquare 援引一位接近维克托-欧尔班总理政府的消息人士的话报道称，贾里德-库什纳的 Affinity Partners 可能会加入阿布扎比开发商 Eagle Hills 在匈牙利的项目。【原文：Jared Kushner’s Affinity Partners could join Abu Dhabi-based developer Eagle Hills’ project in Hungary, Vsquare reported, citing a source close to Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s government.】

item.title: 芝加哥学校从循环信贷中获得 4 亿美元预付款
item.description: 作为与美国银行和 PNC 银行签订的短期循环信贷协议的一部分，芝加哥教育委员会本月首次预支了 4 亿美元。【原文：The Chicago Board of Education took an initial advance of $400 million this month as part of its short-term revolving credit agreements with Bank of America and PNC Bank.】

item.title: 阿根廷 11 月经济增长超预期
item.description: 阿根廷经济 11 月份的增长超过预期，在第三季度超过增长预期后继续显示出复苏迹象。【原文：Argentina’s economy expanded more than expected in November, continuing to show signs of recovery after surpassing growth forecasts in the third quarter.】

item.title: 巴西酝酿大型食品折扣网络以提升卢拉的人气
item.description: 巴西政府正在权衡各种措施，例如通过商店网络提供减价食品，以抗击通货膨胀，提高总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦的声望。【原文：Brazil’s government is weighing measures such as providing reduced-cost food products through a network of stores in an attempt to combat inflation and boost President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s popularity.】

item.title: 页岩推动阿根廷实现 2006 年以来最大能源贸易顺差
item.description: 得益于阿根廷瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩区蓬勃发展的石油和天然气生产，阿根廷在 2024 年实现了近二十年来最大规模的年度能源贸易顺差。预计今年的情况会更好。【原文：Argentina scored its widest annual energy trade surplus in nearly two decades in 2024 thanks to booming oil and gas production in the country’s Vaca Muerta shale patch. It’s forecast to do even better this year.】

item.title: 巴西部长称特朗普退出巴黎会议将推动投资者移居海外
item.description: 巴西能源部长表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布美国退出具有里程碑意义的《巴黎协定》，为将数十亿美元的投资引向包括巴西在内的其他经济体打开了空间。【原文：President Donald Trump’s withdrawal of the US from the landmark Paris Agreement opens room to drive billions of dollars in investment to other economies including Brazil, according to its energy minister.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击欧盟监管机构将矛头指向苹果、谷歌和 Meta
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普抨击欧盟监管机构将矛头指向苹果公司、Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司和 Meta Platforms 公司，称他们针对美国公司的案件是 "一种征税形式"。【原文：US President Donald Trump blasted European Union regulators for targeting Apple Inc., Alphabet Inc.’s Google and Meta Platforms Inc., describing their cases against American companies as “a form of taxation.”】

item.title: 特朗普向达沃斯观众发表的煤炭言论提振美国矿工
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四在瑞士达沃斯世界经济论坛上发表视频讲话，将煤炭作为一种能源加以推广，此后美国煤炭生产商的股价攀升。【原文：US coal producers’ shares climbed after President Donald Trump promoted the fuel as a power source during a video address Thursday to the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland.】

item.title: Wamco 调整债券策略，努力留住投资人员
item.description: 西方资产管理公司（Western Asset Management Co.【原文：Western Asset Management Co. is revamping some of its fixed-income strategies and trying to retain investment staff, as the once-hailed bond giant continues to face the fallout from its star trader being charged with criminal fraud.】

item.title: 据说香港长江基建正在考虑出售价值 40 亿英镑的英国 Eversholt Rail 公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，长江基建控股有限公司（CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd.）正在评估 Eversholt Rail 的各种选择，包括可能出售这家英国机车车辆公司，其估值可能高达 40 亿英镑（49 亿美元）。【原文：CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd. is evaluating options for Eversholt Rail, including a possible sale that may value the British rolling stock company at as much as £4 billion ($4.9 billion), people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 法国将在 2025 年预算中向高收入者征税 20 亿欧元
item.description: 法国财政部官员表示，法国政府预计，为打击最富有个人的税收优化行为而计划征收的税款将在今年筹集到 20 亿欧元（约合 21 亿美元）。【原文：The French government expects a planned levy to counter tax optimization by the richest individuals to raise €2 billion ($2.1 billion) this year, according to Finance Ministry officials.】

item.title: 特朗普在达沃斯敦促降低油价和利率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四在达沃斯向世界各国领导人发表讲话时表示，他将要求沙特阿拉伯和其他欧佩克国家 "降低石油成本"，并重申他威胁要利用关税将制造业带回美国。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would ask Saudi Arabia and other OPEC nations to “bring down the cost of oil” and reiterated his threat to use tariffs to bring manufacturing back to the US as he addressed world leaders gathered in Davos on Thursday.】

item.title: 据称 Triton 正探讨以 20 亿欧元出售德国 Kelvion 公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司 Triton Partners 正在探讨出售德国冷却设备供应商 Kelvion 的事宜，交易价格可能超过 20 亿欧元（21 亿美元）。【原文：Buyout firm Triton Partners is exploring a sale of Kelvion, a German supplier of cooling equipment, that could fetch more than €2 billion ($2.1 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 财政部长称欧洲经济下滑令瑞士担忧
item.description: 瑞士财政部长担心欧盟和德国的经济衰退也会打击瑞士企业，因为这两个国家都是瑞士最重要的贸易伙伴。【原文：Switzerland’s finance minister is concerned that the economic slump in the European Union and Germany will also hit Swiss companies, as both are among the most important trading partners of the country.】

item.title: 埃克森表示，特朗普快速销售更多液化天然气的计划面临障碍
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划迅速向全球出售更多液化天然气，但由于今年供应量有限以及欧洲不愿承诺长期交易，该计划可能面临困难。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s plan to quickly sell more liquefied natural gas to the world could face difficulties due to limited supplies this year and reluctance in Europe to commit to long-term deals.】

item.title: 中国天齐锂业发布盈利警告并停止扩张
item.description: 天齐锂业公司（Tianqi Lithium Corp. ）警告称，由于电池金属市场持续低迷，该公司预计 2024 年的净亏损将高达 82 亿元人民币（11 亿美元），并将停止在澳大利亚的扩建项目。【原文：Tianqi Lithium Corp. warned that it expects to post a net loss of as much as 8.2 billion yuan ($1.1 billion) for 2024, and is halting an expansion project in Australia as a downturn in the battery metals markets drags on.】

item.title: PE 公司 EQT 将在 2025 年进行更多首次公开募股，称市场 "光明而开放
item.description: 瑞典私募股权公司 EQT AB 希望利用股市好转的机会，继 2024 年的强劲表现之后，通过首次公开募股实现更多的货币化退出。【原文：Swedish private equity firm EQT AB is looking to take advantage of an improving stock market to monetize more exits via initial public offerings, following a strong run in 2024.】

item.title: Pimco 等大牌公司积极管理的债券基金引领复兴
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.）等业内重量级公司积极管理的美国债券基金去年吸引了最多的新投资，因为资金在经历了两年的枯竭期后又开始回流。【原文：US bond funds actively managed by industry heavyweights like Pacific Investment Management Co. attracted the most new investment last year as money returned after a two-year dry spell.】

item.title: 私人信贷在 IPO 市场低迷之际扶持成长中的科技公司
item.description: 私人信用贷款机构正蜂拥而至，为准备上市的大型、快速增长的科技公司提供融资，利用首次公开募股市场的低迷，帮助它们在此期间获得流动资金。【原文：Private credit lenders are flocking to finance large, fast-growing technology companies gearing up to go public, taking advantage of a lackluster market for initial public offerings and helping them get access to liquidity in the meantime.】

item.title: 尽管锂供应过剩问题日益严重，智利仍对锂扩张保持信心
item.description: 智利拥有世界上最大的锂储量，即使在全球锂储量过剩加剧、电池金属行业受到挤压的情况下，智利仍有信心让投资者竞相获得开采新矿藏的许可。【原文：Chile, home to the world’s biggest lithium reserves, is confident that investors will compete for licenses to drill new deposits even amid a worsening global glut that’s squeezing the battery-metal industry.】
